name: Touhou Time Twister (DEMO)
description:
(Note: The following is an in-development demo. Things may be subject to improvements and changes in the official release).

After obtaining a temporal magatama, Sumireko Usami decides to use it to go on a time traveling adventure! A Visual Novel (with minigames) featuring:

  • Two different routes with different tones and plots.
  • A flyby of different eras of Touhou history.
  • Arrangements of Classic Touhou Songs.

Controls:
Use the Z key to advance text, press 5 to go into windowed mode, 6 to go into fullscreen, and escape to instantly quit the game. Click on the buttons on the title screen with the mouse.

Credits:
Directing, Programming, Writing: Megapig9001
Writing: CheddaKarp
Main Character Art: Zholu
Main Character Art: Jaynie
Music (Minigame): Ethangellion
Music (Title Screen, Recap, Story Scene), Sound Effects: Wookywok (https://www.youtube.com/user/wookywok/videos)
Sumireko Sprite: OomphaKhanta
BakeBake Sprite: Gatoman20xx (https://gatomon20xx.itch.io/)
Magatama Drawing: Captaindiz (https://itch.io/profile/captaindiz)
Backgrounds, Engine Assets, Block Sprite, Ball Sprites: DJThunderHeart (https://twitter.com/DJThunder_Heart)

"Dog Growling" Sound Effect by Mike Koeing
"Running" Sound Effect By Disagree

The following is a derivative work of the "Touhou Project" series. Touhou and all of its characters are owned by Team Shanghai Alice.
